AJAXjQueryDIVID"rating".

$(document).ready(function() {
	// generate markup
	var ratingMarkup = ["Please rate: "];
	for(var i=1; i <= 5; i++) {
		ratingMarkup[ratingMarkup.length] = "<a href='#'>" + i + "</a> ";
	}
	// add markup to container and applier click handlers to anchors
	$("#rating").append( ratingMarkup.join('') ).find("a").click(function(e) {
		e.preventDefault();
		// send requests
		$.post("rate.php", {rating: $(this).html()}, function(xml) {
			// format result
			var result = [
				"Thanks for rating, current average: ",
				$("average", xml).text(),
				", number of votes: ",
				$("count", xml).text()
			];
			// output result
			$("#rating").html(result.join(''));
		} );
	});
});

$.fn.check = function(mode) {
	var mode = mode || 'on'; // if mode is undefined, use 'on' as default
	return this.each(function() {
		switch(mode) {
		case 'on':
			this.checked = true;
			break;
		case 'off':
			this.checked = false;
			break;
		case 'toggle':
			this.checked = !this.checked;
			break;
		}
	});
};

$("input[type='checkbox']").check('toggle');

$.fn.rateMe = function(options) {
	var container = this; // instead of selecting a static container with $("#rating"), we now use the jQuery context

	var settings = {
		url: "rate.php"
		// put more defaults here
		// remember to put a comma (",") after each pair, but not after the last one!
	};

	if(options) { // check if options are present before extending the settings
		$.extend(settings, options);
	}

	// ...
	// rest of the code
	// ...

	return this; // if possible, return "this" to not break the chain
});

# 
ssh keygithub,github,macgithubrepo,,,?

# 
 **""** ! google,,:

## :
1. githubrepo,ssh keygithub.
2. sshgitremote,ssh key.

<!-- more -->
## :
1. ssh key,~/.ssh,`cp -r ~/.ssh ~/ssh_bak`,,:
  ```json
  $ cd ~/.ssh
  $ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "your_email@youremail.com"
  ```
  ,.ssh,,,:
  ```json
  -rw-------   1 abc  staff   179  5  2 3:06 id_rsa
  -rw-r--r--   1 abc  staff    10  5  2 3:06 id_rsa.pub
  -rw-------   1 abc  staff   326 11  9 6:12 id_rsa_abc
  -rw-r--r--   1 abc  staff    37 11  9 6:12 id_rsa_abc.pub
  -rw-------   1 abc  staff   326 11  9 6:12 id_rsa_xyz
  -rw-r--r--   1 abc  staff    37 11  9 6:12 id_rsa_xyz.pub
  ```
  ,id_rsa_abc.pubgithub.
2. keykey:
  ```json
  $ ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa
  $ ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa_abc
  $ ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa_xyz
  ```
  :
  ```json
  $ ssh-add -l
  ```
3. sshconfig:
    ```json
    $ vim ~/.ssh/config
    ```
    :
    ```json
    Host abc-github
        HostName github.com
        User git
        IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_abc
    Host xyz-github
        HostName github.com
        User git
        IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_xyz
    ```
    Host,,HostName,,ssh key,key,.
4. gitremote,`dir/.git/config`remote.
  ```json
  [remote "origin"]
          url = git@abc-github:loyoo/testAAA.git
          fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/origin/*
  ```
  , **** ,`github.com`,! ,id_rsa_abcfetchpush.

Post._content:
# 

openSSH6.6:
> "verify_host_key SSHFP DNS RR (CVE-2014-2653),OpenSSH6.6."

yum6.6(CentOS7),rpm6.6p1,,,ssh,telnet,,__!__

,20,:

<!-- more -->
# yumtelnetopenssh
root,:

```
cd ~
mkdir sshUpdate && cd sshUpdate \
&& yum install -y xinetd telnet-server make perl pam pam-devel zlib zlib-devel openssl-devel \
&& yum install -y gcc* \
&& vim /etc/xinetd.d/telnet
```
/etc/xinetd.d/telnet(telnetkrb5-telnet) disable=yesno,.

# telnet

```
/etc/init.d/xinetd restart && vim /etc/sysconfig/iptables
```
telnetiptables23,telnet,iptables

```
service iptables restart
```
,terminaltelnet <ip>,,,23iptables,.

# openssh6.7p1
yum update opensslopenssl,1.0.1.
:

```
cd ~/sshUpdate \
&& wget http://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/OpenSSH/portable/openssh-6.7p1.tar.gz && mv /etc/ssh /etc/ssh.bak \
&& rpm -e `rpm -qa | grep openssh` --nodeps \
&& tar zxf openssh-6.7p1.tar.gz && cd openssh-6.7p1 \
&& ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc/ssh --with-pam --with-zlib --with-md5-passwords \
&& make && make install \
&& ssh -V
```
6.7,sshopenssh,,,yum,,yum,.
ssh,openSSH6.7p1,.

# ssh

```
cp contrib/redhat/sshd.init /etc/init.d/sshd && chkconfig --add sshd \
&& service sshd start && vim /etc/ssh/sshd_config
```
sshsshd,sshd_config,xshell4,:
![sshd](/images/openssh_sshd_config.jpg)
,sshdsshd:

```
service sshd restart && chkconfig --list sshd
```

# telnet
telnet,:

```
/etc/init.d/xinetd stop && vi /etc/xinetd.d/telnet
```
disable=yesno.
iptables23,iptables.
,ssh,ssh -V.
